title: Abstract Shape Class
description:
Create:
1. Abstract class Shape with: String color field, constructor, abstract method getArea()
2. Circle class extending Shape with: double radius, constructor, getArea() implementation
   (area = π * r²)
instructions:

testCases.description:
Circle c = new Circle("red", 5.0);
return c.color;

Circle c = new Circle("blue", 10.0);
return Math.abs(c.getArea() - 314.159) < 1.0;

Circle c = new Circle("green", 3.0);
return c.getArea() > 28.0 && c.getArea() < 29.0;
